</$navigator>"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme","created":"20220913015035420","modified":"20220920091946922","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Customized shortcuts with `⌨️` at the beginning of description in [[shortcuts|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]] or press <kbd>alt h</kbd>

!! TODO

* add tip for repeat press this shortcut
* can't scroll to determined tiddler repreat
* another usage is if your tiddlywiki get bad, you can't find any buttons because of install some stanger plugins(even enable safemode), now you can press <kbd>ctrl I</kbd> to call setting
* add system image for tips use class"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/search-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/search-filter","caption":"search-filter","created":"20220920091946922","key":"((search-filter))","modified":"20220920091946922","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
